technologies.name: WordPress
technologies.description: WordPress is a free and open-source content management system written in PHP and paired with a MySQL or MariaDB database. Features include a plugin architecture and a template system.

technologies.name: Elementor
technologies.description: Elementor is a website builder platform for professionals on WordPress.

technologies.name: BetterDocs
technologies.description: BetterDocs is an advanced documentation and knowledge base plugin for WordPress and Shopify.

technologies.name: MySQL
technologies.description: MySQL is an open-source relational database management system.

technologies.name: PHP
technologies.description: PHP is a general-purpose scripting language used for web development.

technologies.name: YouTube
technologies.description: YouTube is a video sharing service where users can create their own profile, upload videos, watch, like and comment on other videos.

technologies.name: WooCommerce
technologies.description: WooCommerce is an open-source ecommerce plugin for WordPress.

technologies.name: W3 Total Cache
technologies.description: W3 Total Cache (W3TC) improves the SEO and increases website performance and reducing load times by leveraging features like content delivery network (CDN) integration and the latest best practices.

technologies.name: Extendify
technologies.description: Extendify (formerly Redux framework) is one of the most popular, advanced, and free to use option panel frameworks for WordPress themes and plugins.

technologies.name: BetterDocs plugin
technologies.description: BetterDocs plugin is an advanced documentation and knowledge base plugin for WordPress.

technologies.name: The Events Calendar
technologies.description: The Events Calendar is a free event management plugin for WordPress.

technologies.name: Backbone.js
technologies.description: BackboneJS is a JavaScript library that allows to develop and structure the client side applications that run in a web browser.

technologies.name: Yoast SEO
technologies.description: Yoast SEO is a search engine optimisation plugin for WordPress and other platforms.

technologies.name: Apache
technologies.description: Apache is a free and open-source cross-platform web server software.

technologies.name: Underscore.js
technologies.description: Underscore.js is a JavaScript library which provides utility functions for common programming tasks. It is comparable to features provided by Prototype.js and the Ruby language, but opts for a functional programming design instead of extending object prototypes.

technologies.name: Choices
technologies.description: Choices.js is a lightweight, configurable select box/text input plugin.

technologies.name: Twitter Emoji (Twemoji)
technologies.description: Twitter Emoji is a set of open-source emoticons and emojis for Twitter, TweetDeck, and also for Android and iOS versions of the application.

technologies.name: Swiper
technologies.description: Swiper is a JavaScript library that creates modern touch sliders with hardware-accelerated transitions.

technologies.name: Select2
technologies.description: Select2 is a jQuery based replacement for select boxes. It supports searching, remote data sets, and infinite scrolling of results.

technologies.name: PhotoSwipe
technologies.description: PhotoSwipe is an open-source gallery to support JavaScript-based image zooming.

technologies.name: Moment.js
technologies.description: Moment.js is a free and open-source JavaScript library that removes the need to use the native JavaScript Date object directly.

technologies.name: Matomo Analytics
technologies.description: Matomo Analytics is a free and open-source web analytics application, that runs on a PHP/MySQL web-server.

technologies.name: Lodash
technologies.description: Lodash is a JavaScript library which provides utility functions for common programming tasks using the functional programming paradigm.

technologies.name: LazySizes
technologies.description: LazySizes is a JavaScript library used to delay the loading of images (iframes, scripts, etc) until they come into view.

technologies.name: jQuery UI
technologies.description: jQuery UI is a collection of GUI widgets, animated visual effects, and themes implemented with jQuery, Cascading Style Sheets, and HTML.

technologies.name: jQuery Migrate
technologies.description: Query Migrate is a javascript library that allows you to preserve the compatibility of your jQuery code developed for versions of jQuery older than 1.9.

technologies.name: jQuery
technologies.description: jQuery is a JavaScript library which is a free, open-source software designed to simplify HTML DOM tree traversal and manipulation, as well as event handling, CSS animation, and Ajax.

technologies.name: Font Awesome
technologies.description: Font Awesome is a font and icon toolkit based on CSS and Less.

technologies.name: Dropzone
technologies.description: Dropzone is a JavaScript library that turns any HTML element into a dropzone.

technologies.name: core-js
technologies.description: core-js is a modular standard library for JavaScript, with polyfills for cutting-edge ECMAScript features.

technologies.name: jsDelivr
technologies.description: JSDelivr is a free public CDN for open-source projects. It can serve web files directly from the npm registry and GitHub repositories without any configuration.

technologies.name: Google Font API
technologies.description: Google Font API is a web service that supports open-source font files that can be used on your web designs.

technologies.name: reCAPTCHA
technologies.description: reCAPTCHA is a free service from Google that helps protect websites from spam and abuse.

technologies.name: webpack
technologies.description: Webpack is an open-source JavaScript module bundler.

technologies.name: CodeMirror
technologies.description: CodeMirror is a JavaScript component that provides a code editor in the browser.

technologies.name: RSS
technologies.description: RSS is a family of web feed formats used to publish frequently updated works—such as blog entries, news headlines, audio, and video—in a standardized format.

technologies.name: Open Graph
technologies.description: Open Graph is a protocol that is used to integrate any web page into the social graph.

technologies.name: Module Federation
technologies.description: Module Federation is a webpack technology for dynamically loading parts of other independently deployed builds.
